00020 //! Resizes a 32 bpp bitmap using a gaussian filter to determine result pixels.
00021 class PLFilterResizeGaussian : public PLFilterResize
00022 {
00023 public:

00025   PLFilterResizeGaussian (int NewXSize, int NewYSize, double NewRadius);
00026   //! 
00027   virtual void Apply(PLBmpBase * pBmpSource, PLBmp * pBmpDest) const;
00028 
00029 private: 
00030   double m_NewRadius;
00031 };
